Well folks this is what i did to get the came to work. Unrar files you will get four cd's in these cd files you will get four image files. set up a directory on your HD called like fair light. In this directory place four folders called cd 1 to 4 now download the no cd crack and place it in the fairlight folder. with iso buster extract the images to the fairlight folder cd1 to 4. Burn the whole fairlight folder to a data dvd. Install the game.copy the two files from the crack/fairlight directory to your program/fairlight/eragon directory. enjoy.

Ok. Since a lot of people are having trouble opening this, I'll go through it STEP by STEP.

After your download finishes you should have a folder named Eragon-FLT (in the folder where your downloads go)

Double click that folder, you will see four folders named cd 1 cd 2 cd 3 and cd 4

Do not click them yet.

Open win rar

Right click CD1 folder and go into properties

Copy the location (completley)

paste it into the winrar address bar

You should see the same folder pop up on the winrar window

Rightclick  cd1 and click "add to archive"

it should begin adding to archives.

Do this once for each cd, when you are finished you should have 1 winrar file for each CD.

now extract them to a seperate folder, cue and bin files will appear for each CD.

Mount these, and there ya go.

If you need a no cd crack you can download it from here.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3559467/Eragon-Fairlight-NOCD.rar
